name: Shrine to the Dark God
description:
Shrine to The Dark God is a fantasy role-playing game where you explore maze-like dungeons.

There have been reports of sightings regarding a new cult that is spreading throughout the city. All around the city, graves have been exhumed. Many believe that this is linked to the rising increase in cult activity. Due to these rising concerns, you have been tasked with entering the catacombs, to investigate this issue further. You soon realise that rumours of the cult are true.
